name: PolyStyreneLoop Coop
goal:
The PolyStyreneLoop project will
demonstrate how PS value-chain partners
have a strong desire to contribute to the
Circular Economy and meet the requirements
by ensuring technically, economically and
environmentally sustainable recycling.
We aim to built a plant in 2019 for a capcity of 3300 mtons/y of polystyrene foam containing a restricted substance /flame retardant HBCD. The polystyrene will be recovered and put back in the same application- upcycling. The HBCD is separated and afterwards destrcuted and the bromine is recovered
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Plastic Strategy, Circular Economy, Interface Plastic - chemicals, Waste Directive, Transboundary transportation, Persistant Organic Pollutants
